net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export

Class JRHtmlExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.JRAbstractExporter<RC,C,HtmlExporterOutput,JRHtmlExporterContext>
      • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export.AbstractHtmlExporter<JRHtmlReportConfiguration,JRHtmlExporterConfiguration>
        • net.sf.jasperreports.engine.export.JRHtmlExporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JRExporter<ExporterInput,JRHtmlReportConfiguration,JRHtmlExporterConfiguration,HtmlExporterOutput>, Exporter<ExporterInput,JRHtmlReportConfiguration,JRHtmlExporterConfiguration,HtmlExporterOutput>
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by HtmlExporter.

    public class JRHtmlExporter
extends AbstractHtmlExporter<JRHtmlReportConfiguration,JRHtmlExporterConfiguration>
    Exports a JasperReports document to HTML format. It has character output type and exports the document to a grid-based layout.
    Version:
    $Id: JRHtmlExporter.java 6967 2014-03-11 17:19:59Z teodord $
    Author:
    Teodor Danciu (teodord@users.sourceforge.net)
